Description: The foundation of every website — structure with HTML and style with CSS.

A utility-first CSS framework that allows developers to rapidly build modern, responsive, and customizable user interfaces.
A state management library for JavaScript apps, commonly used with React to manage and share data across components efficiently.
Microsoft's modern, cross-platform framework for building fast backend services.
An ORM that lets you work with databases using C# objects — no SQL needed!
A JavaScript runtime built on Chrome's V8 engine that allows developers to build scalable and high-performance backend applications.
A minimal and flexible Node.js web application framework that provides robust features for building APIs and web servers.
A full-stack JavaScript framework combining MongoDB, Express, React, and Node.js for building complete web applications.
A powerful combination of Django for backend and React for frontend, used to build robust and interactive full-stack applications.
An enterprise-level full-stack framework pairing .NET for backend APIs with Angular for building dynamic single-page applications.
The modern programming language for Android app development.
Develop Android and iOS apps from a single codebase using Flutter and Dart, including Firebase integration.
Build cross-platform mobile apps for Android and iOS using JavaScript and React Native with hands-on projects.
Apple's powerful and intuitive language for iOS and macOS apps.

Develop mobile apps for both Android and iOS using React and JavaScript.
Use C# and .NET to build cross-platform mobile apps with native performance.
Build hybrid mobile apps with modern web technologies and native integration.
The leading platform for creating 2D and 3D games with C# scripting.

A powerful framework for creating immersive 3D web experiences and games.

Master container orchestration for deploying, scaling, and managing applications across clusters.

Automate workflows directly in GitHub for building, testing, and deploying applications.
An open-source automation server that helps automate parts of software development like building and deployment.
A built-in CI/CD tool in GitLab for automating builds, tests, and deployments efficiently.
Containerization platform used to package and run applications consistently across environments.
A container orchestration platform that automates deployment, scaling, and management of containerized apps.
Infrastructure as Code (IaC) tool that provisions and manages cloud infrastructure using configuration files.
A network protocol analyzer used to capture and analyze packets for troubleshooting and security testing.
A penetration testing framework used to identify, exploit, and validate vulnerabilities in systems.
An open-source intrusion detection and prevention system (IDS/IPS) that monitors network traffic for malicious activity.
Perform controlled attacks to identify and exploit vulnerabilities ethically.
Use tools like Metasploit to automate exploitation and post-exploitation tasks.
Test and secure web applications against common vulnerabilities like SQL injection and XSS.

Collaborate between red and blue teams to improve overall security posture.
